sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2023-06-14 21:04:34.301585 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2023-06-14T19:38:42.5011995-04:00.

body.ab: <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C12"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__1"/>"Dear, dear Elizabeth"I exclaimed<lb n="c56-0065__main__2"/>when I had read her letter"–Iwill write <lb n="c56-0065__main__3"/>instantlyand relieve them from the <lb n="c56-0065__main__4"/>great painthey must feel." <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__5"/>I wrote, and this exertion greatly <lb n="c56-0065__main__6"/>fatigued me <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13438"/>; <sga-add eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13438"/> b <mod sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13441"/> <mdel>y</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13445"/>ut <sga-add eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13445"/><mod eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13441"/>my convalescence <mod sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13449"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0065__main__d5e13451">was</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0065.01"/><lb n="c56-0065__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0065__left_margin__d5e13460"/>had <sga-add eID="c56-0065__left_margin__d5e13460"/><mod eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13449"/><lb n="c56-0065__main__7"/>commencedand <mod sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13467"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0065__main__d5e13469">went <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13471"/>on <sga-add eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13471"/> </del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13475"/>proceeded <sga-add eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13475"/><mod eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13467"/> regularly–in<lb n="c56-0065__main__8"/>another fortnight I was able to <lb n="c56-0065__main__9"/>leave my chamber. <lb n="c56-0065__main__10"/> <metamark function="separate">______</metamark> <lb n="c56-0066__main__1"/> <milestone spanTo="#c56-0066.05" unit="tei:head"/> Chap. 8 <shi rend="sup"></shi><anchor xml:id="c56-0066.05"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__2"/>one of my first duties on my recovery was <lb n="c56-0066__main__3"/>to introduce Clerval to the <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13514"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13516"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13516"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13522"/>several<sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13522"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13514"/>professors of <lb n="c56-0066__main__4"/>the university. And in doing thisI under <lb n="c56-0066__main__5"/>went <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13530">torments</del>a kind of rough usage <lb n="c56-0066__main__6"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13536">that</del>ill <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13539">befitten</del> befitt <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13542"/> <mdel>ed</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13546"/>ing <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13546"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13542"/>the wounds <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13550"/>that <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13550"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__7"/>my mind had sustained. Ever since the <lb n="c56-0066__main__8"/>fatal night –the end of my labours &<lb n="c56-0066__main__9"/>thebeginning of my misfortunes <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13560"> <unclear>(</unclear> </del>I had <lb n="c56-0066__main__10"/>conceived a violent antipathy even to <lb n="c56-0066__main__11"/>the name of <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13569"/> <mdel>Ch</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13573">Chemistry</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13576"/>Natural Philosophy <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13576"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13569"/> .When I was <w ana="start"/>other<lb n="c56-0066__main__12"/>wise<w ana="end"/>quite restored to healththe sight of <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13587"/>a <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13587"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__13"/>Chemical instrument <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0066.02"/>brought on <lb n="c56-0066__main__14"/>again <delSpan anchor="c56-0066.02"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13599"/>renewed <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13599"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13646">in a chest</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13649"/>apparatus from my <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13651">che</del> view <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13649"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13641"/>he had also <lb n="c56-0066__main__17"/>changed my <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13658"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13660">room</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13663"/>ap <mdel>p</mdel> artment, <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13663"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13658"/>for he perceived that <lb n="c56-0066__main__18"/>I had <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13672"/> <mdel>a</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13676"/>acquired <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13676"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13672"/>dislike tothe room which had <lb n="c56-0066__main__19"/>previously been my workshop.But these <lb n="c56-0066__main__20"/>cares of Clerval were <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13684"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13686">thrown away</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13689"/>made of no avail<sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13689"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13684"/>when <lb n="c56-0066__main__21"/>I visited the professors. even my excellent <lb n="c56-0066__main__22"/>M. Waldman inflicted torture when <lb n="c56-0066__main__23"/>he praisedwith <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13700">the</del> kindness and warmth, <lb n="c56-0066__main__24"/>the astonishing progress that I had made <lb n="c56-0066__main__25"/>in the sciences. He soon perceived <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13707"/> <mdel>my</mdel> <anchor xml:id="c56-0066.03"/><lb n="c56-0066__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0066__left_margin__d5e13717"/>that I <sga-add eID="c56-0066__left_margin__d5e13717"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13707"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__26"/> dislike <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13725"/>d <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13725"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13728">of</del>the subject, butnot guessing <lb n="c56-0066__main__27"/>the real causehe attributed <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13733"/> <mdel>to</mdel> <mdel>it</mdel> <anchor xml:id="c56-0066.04"/><lb n="c56-0066__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0066__left_margin__d5e13745"/>my feelings <sga-add eID="c56-0066__left_margin__d5e13745"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13733"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__28"/>to modesty <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13753">on hearing myself praised</del> <lb n="c56-0067__main__1"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13766">he therefore</del><anchor xml:id="c56-0067.01"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13775"/>and <sga-add eID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13775"/>changed the subject from <lb n="c56-0067__main__2"/>my improvement,to the science itself, <lb n="c56-0067__main__3"/>with <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13783">an</del> a desireas I evidently saw<lb n="c56-0067__main__4"/>of drawing <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13788">friend</del> me out. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13791">K</del> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0067.02"/>Kind <lb n="c56-0067__main__5"/>friend he tortured me without <delSpan anchor="c56-0067.02"/><delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0067.03"/>but <lb n="c56-0067__main__6"/>it <delSpan anchor="c56-0067.03"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13807">How cruel is</del> What could I do? <lb n="c56-0067__main__7"/>He meant to please <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13813">and</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13816">me</del>& he <lb n="c56-0067__main__8"/><mod sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13821"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13823">tortured</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0067.04"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13832"/>tormented <sga-add eID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13832"/><mod eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13821"/> me <mod sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13836"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13838">it was</del><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13841"/>I felt <sga-add eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13841"/><mod eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13836"/>as if he <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13846">had</del><lb n="c56-0067__main__9"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0067.05"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13857"/>placed <sga-add eID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13857"/>carefullyone by one <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13860">placed</del>in my <lb n="c56-0067__main__10"/>view those instruments which were <lb n="c56-0067__main__11"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0067.06"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13874"/>to be <sga-add eID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13874"/>afterwards used in putting me to a <lb n="c56-0067__main__12"/>slow and cruel <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13879">dre</del> death. I writhed <lb n="c56-0067__main__13"/>under his words, yet dared not shew <lb n="c56-0067__main__14"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13887">my</del>the pain I felt. Clerval, whose <lb n="c56-0067__main__15"/>eyes and feelings were always quick <lb n="c56-0067__main__16"/>in di <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13894"/>s <sga-add eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13894"/>cerningthe sensations of others<lb n="c56-0067__main__17"/>declined the subject alledging <mod sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13900"/> <mdel>in</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13904"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><sga-add eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13904"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13910"/>his <sga-add eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13910"/><mod eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13900"/><lb n="c56-0067__main__18"/>ignorance& the conversation took <lb n="c56-0067__main__19"/>a more general turn. I thanked him<lb n="c56-0067__main__20"/>from my heart, but I did not speak. <lb n="c56-0067__main__21"/> I plainly sawthat he was surprised, <lb n="c56-0067__main__22"/>but he never attempted to draw <lb n="c56-0067__main__23"/>my secret from me,and although <lb n="c56-0067__main__24"/>I loved him with a mixture of <lb n="c56-0067__main__25"/><mod sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13931"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13933">love</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0067.07"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13942"/>affection<sga-add eID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13942"/><mod eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13931"/>and reverence that knew no <lb n="c56-0067__main__26"/>bounds,yet I could never <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13948"> <unclear>pr</unclear> </del> persuade <lb n="c56-0067__main__27"/>myself to confide to him that event <lb n="c56-0067__main__28"/>which was so often present to my <lb n="c56-0067__main__29"/>thoughts,but which I feared the detail <lb n="c56-0067__main__30"/>to another would only impress more deeply. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0068__main__d5e13979"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0068__main__d5e13985"/>equally <sga-add eID="c56-0068__main__d5e13985"/><mod xml:id="c56-0068.03"/><lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__1"/>in my then <lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__2"/>conditionof <lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__3"/>almost <w ana="start"/>in<lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__4"/>supportable<w ana="end"/><lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__5"/>sensitiveness <anchor xml:id="c56-0068.04"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0068.01"/>his harsh <lb n="c56-0068__main__3"/>blunt econiumsgave me even more <lb n="c56-0068__main__4"/>pain <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0068__main__d5e14033">that</del> than the benevolent <lb n="c56-0068__main__5"/>approbation of M. Waldman —"Dam <mod sID="c56-0068__main__d5e14038"/> <mdel>m</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0068__main__d5e14042"/>n <sga-add eID="c56-0068__main__d5e14042"/><mod eID="c56-0068__main__d5e14038"/><lb n="c56-0068__main__6"/>"the fellow,"cried he "Why M <shi rend="sup">r</shi> . Clerval <lb n="c56-0068__main__7"/>"I tellyou he has <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0068__main__d5e14054">beaut</del> outstript <lb n="c56-0068__main__8"/> "us all– aystare if you pleasebut <lb n="c56-0068__main__9"/>"itis nevertheless true –A youngster <lb n="c56-0068__main__10"/>"whobut <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0068__main__d5e14064">two</del> threeyears agobelieved <lb n="c56-0068__main__11"/>"Cornelius Agrippa <mod sID="c56-0068__main__d5e14069"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0068__main__d5e14071">to be</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" is not soon <lb n="c56-0068__main__14"/>"pulled downwe shall all be out <lb n="c56-0068__main__15"/>"of countenance.—Aye, Aye,continued <lb n="c56-0068__main__16"/>"heobserving my <mod sID="c56-0068__main__d5e14095"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0068__main__d5e14097">countenance</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0068__main__d5e14100"/> <metamark ana="start"/>Franken<lb n="c56-0068__main__18"/>stein<w ana="end"/>is modestan excellent quality in <lb n="c56-0068__main__19"/>"ayoung man;Young men should be <lb n="c56-0068__main__20"/>"diffidentof themselvesyou know M<shi rend="sup"> </shi> <lb n="c56-0068__main__21"/>" Clerval;I was myself when youngbut <lb n="c56-0068__main__22"/>"one soon growsout of that."<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0068__main__23"/>M <shi rend="sup"></shi>Krempe had now commenced <lb n="c56-0068__main__24"/><mod sID="c56-0068__main__d5e14154"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0068__main__d5e14156">the subject of his own praise</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0068__main__d5e14159"/>an eulogy on himself <sga-add eID="c56-0068__main__d5e14159"/><mod eID="c56-0068__main__d5e14154"/> and that<lb n="c56-0068__main__25"/>happily turned the conversation <lb n="c56-0068__main__26"/>from thesubject that was so <mod sID="c56-0068__main__d5e14167"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0068__main__d5e14169">painful</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0068__main__d5e14172"/>agonizing<sga-add eID="c56-0068__main__d5e14172"/><mod eID="c56-0068__main__d5e14167"/><lb n="c56-0068__main__27"/>to me. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0068__main__28"/>Clerval was no natural philosopher. <lb n="c56-0068__main__29"/>His imagination was too vividfor <lb n="c56-0069__main__1"/> the minutiæ of science. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0069__main__d5e14195">La</del> <w ana="start"/>Lan<lb n="c56-0069__main__2"/>guages<w ana="end"/> were his <mod sID="c56-0069__main__d5e14205"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0069__main__d5e14207">chief</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" n="c56-0071__main__25"/>hedgeswhile those of summer were <w ana="start"/>al<lb n="c56-0071__main__26"/>ready<w ana="end"/>in bud–I <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0071__main__d5e15049">dis</del> was not disturbedby <lb n="c56-0071__main__27"/>thoughts thatduring the preceeding<lb n="c56-0071__main__28"/>year pressed upon me not <w ana="start"/>withstand<lb n="c56-0071__main__29"/>ing<w ana="end"/>my endeavours to throw them off<sga-add hand="#pbs" place="sublinear" sID="c56-0071__main__d5e15063"/>with an invincible burthen.<sga-add eID="c56-0071__main__d5e15063"/><lb n="c56-0071__main__30"/>Henry <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0071__main__d5e15068">a</del> rejoiced <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0071__main__d5e15072">im</del> in my gaietyand <lb n="c56-0071__main__31"/>sincerely sympathizedin my <mod sID="c56-0071__main__d5e15077"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0071__main__d5e15079">joy</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0071__main__d5e15082"/>feelings <sga-add eID="c56-0071__main__d5e15082"/><mod eID="c56-0071__main__d5e15077"/> –he <w ana="start"/>exer<lb n="c56-0072__main__1"/>ted<w ana="end"/>himself to amuse me, while he expressed <lb n="c56-0072__main__2"/>the feelingsthat <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0072__main__d5e15103">al</del> filled his <mod sID="c56-0072__main__d5e15106"/> <del n="c56-0072__main__3"/>resources of his mind on this occasion <lb n="c56-0072__main__4"/>were truly astonishing. <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0072.01"/>As we rested during <lb n="c56-0072__main__5"/>the sultry heat of noon he invented <delSpan anchor="c56-0072.01"/><lb n="c56-0072__main__6"/>hisconversation was full of imagination<lb n="c56-0072__main__7"/>and very often, in imitation of the <w ana="start"/>persi<lb n="c56-0072__main__8"/>an<w ana="end"/>&Arabic writers, he invented tales <lb n="c56-0072__main__9"/>of <mod sID="c56-0072__main__d5e15145"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0072__main__d5e15147">great</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0072__main__d5e15150"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add interrest.At other <lb n="c56-0072__main__10"/>times he repeated my favourite poems<lb n="c56-0072__main__11"/>or drew me out into argumentswhich <lb n="c56-0072__main__12"/>he supported with great ingenuity. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0072__main__13"/>We returned <mod sID="c56-0072__main__d5e15171"/><sga-add place="sublinear" joyfuland happy –my <lb n="c56-0072__main__16"/>own spirits were highand I bounded <lb n="c56-0072__main__17"/>along with <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0072__main__d5e15192">a</del> feelings
